Beheader.display_help: This is an attempt to remove your opponent's head from his neck with your Battle Axe. This attack is fairly quick for such a large weapon, and can knock down foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Chop.display_help: Chop deals heavy damage with your Battle Axe, although it is much slower than Beheader. This attack can knock down a target. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

Gash.display_help: Gashes your opponent with your Battle Axe dealing superior damage. This attack is very slow, but can deal a lot damage and knock the target down. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You tap into your inner strength with your {PowerName} and are more accurate and more deadly for a short while.

Swoop.display_help: A Swoop of your Battle Axe deals a superior amount of damage, and can send your target flying upwards. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Confront.display_help: Challenges a foe to attack you. Useful to pull a villain off an ally who finds themselves in over their head. A To Hit check required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Fast

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
Your {PowerName} hit, and you Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
messages.display_victim_hit: {Playersource} hit you with their {Powername}. You have been Taunted!

messages.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} partially hit! {PlayerDest} is not taunted but their range is reduced!
messages.display_victim_hit: {Playersource} partially hits you with their Taunt! Your range is reduced but the Taunt is not successful!

Whirling_Axe.display_help: You spin your Battle Axe in a huge arc, attacking all nearby foes. This attack deals moderate damage to any foe it hits, and can knock them down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Whirling_Axe.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Knockdown

Cleave.display_help: This is an attempt to split your opponent in two with one fell swoop of your Battle Axe. It is an extremely devastating attack that deals massive damage and can knock foes to the ground. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

Pendulum.display_help: This attack swings your Battle Axe in an arc directly in front of you. Foes struck by this attack are dealt heavy damage, and may be knocked down. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
